https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bMkRWgAvwe0XkpL8swG7UA4N4Q8.jpg Two friends' tour of Europe takes a dark turn when one of them contracts a mysterious illness. They race to find out what it is and how to cure it before the sickness consumes him completely. Afflicted
